import React from 'react' import './Category.css' import { FiChevronDown } from 'react-icons/fi' import Channel from './Channel' import db from './firebase' function Category({ id, title }) { const channelId = useSelector(selectChannelId) const [channels, setChannels] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { db.collection('categories').doc(channelId) }, []) return (

{title}
